path.description: [unit]The path of the unit to spawn.

spawn_at_node.description: [string]The node at which this unit will be spawned.

id.description: [string]The id of this effect. Referenced when playing/stopping this particle effect.

link_unit.description: [bool]Wether or not the spawned unit should be linked to the parent unit.

link_offset.description: Additional offset for the unit when we link it.

link_rotation.description: Additional rotation for the unit when we link it.

on_destroy.description: The strategy on how to handle the unit when this entity is destroyed.

on_replace.description: The strategy on how to handle the unit when this entity is trying to play an effect that already exists.

on_death.description: The strategy on how to handle the unit when this entity dies.

corpse_decay.description: [bool]If enabled, the unit will corpse decay instead of being popped out of existance when removed.
